scripts.create: source config/config.$EnvName.env && run-s prep-template create-stack wait-create-stack describe-stack
scripts.update: source config/config.$EnvName.env && run-s prep-template update-stack wait-update-stack describe-stack
scripts.delete: source config/config.$EnvName.env && run-s prep-template delete-stack wait-delete-stack describe-stack
scripts.create-stack: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile --template-body file://template.cfn.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=Ec2InstanceKeyname,ParameterValue=$Ec2InstanceKeyname ParameterKey=EnvName,ParameterValue=$EnvName
scripts.update-stack: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile --template-body file://template.cfn.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=Ec2InstanceKeyname,ParameterValue=$Ec2InstanceKeyname ParameterKey=EnvName,ParameterValue=$EnvName
